summary: The customer was looking to downgrade their Contoso Wireless services and the agent provided them with options for different plans that they could choose from. The customer chose the basic plan which includes coverage for up to four devices and unlimited talk and text, but does not include data. The agent explained the process for downgrading services and advised the customer to double-check any changes before making them permanent. They also let the customer know that they could upgrade back to their original levels at any time.
